reviewText: Love this DVD and the condition was top notch and the timely delivery was great. Thanks for the wonderful experience.
this makes no sense why they are reissuing this in pieces.  just very disappointing because the show is so great but they're screwing up the dvd releases.

These 2 discs are from the 4 disc season 2 set. I found this out the hard way. It never occured to me that they were just reissuing some of the second season.  Mainly because it makes no mention on the box what season the shows are from. I love the show, but hate how History is issuing the seasons.
